Name: Caramel Manhattan
Ingredients: 1 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist and pineapple wedge.
Express lemon zest twist over the cocktail and discard.
Garnish with pineapple wedge on rim.
Review: Flavours combine harmoniously with the character of the bourbon still evident.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2002 by Nick Strangeway in London, England. See: Manhattan cocktail history
Nutrition: One serving of Caramel Manhattan contains 187 calories
